nodes.bodyText: Mind replacing this with Boolean.parseBoolean(metadata.get(Constants.HeaderConstants.DIRECTORY_METADATA_KEY)), it does the same thing.
Was this actually done in this PR? I'm not really seeing a change that would indicate this.
